trans-unit.source: Ways to Troubleshoot or Work Around Issues with Self-Service Sign-Up | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Ways to Troubleshoot or Work Around Issues with Self-Service Sign-Up | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Způsoby řešení problémů při samoobslužné registraci | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Learn about the most common reasons why you may not be able to complete the signup to Business Central, and ways to work around them.

seg-source.mrk: Learn about the most common reasons why you may not be able to complete the signup to Business Central, and ways to work around them.

target.mrk: Naučte se o nejčastějších důvodech, proč nelze dokončit registraci do Business Central, a o způsobech, jakými tyto problémy vyřešit.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting Self-Service Sign-Up

seg-source.mrk: Troubleshooting Self-Service Sign-Up

target.mrk: Řešení problémů při samoobslužné registraci.

trans-unit.source: Signing up for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is easy and can be done very quickly.

seg-source.mrk: Signing up for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is easy and can be done very quickly.

target.mrk: Registrace do [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] je jednoduchá a lze ji provést velmi rychle.

trans-unit.source: You can create a free account even if you are an existing organization.

seg-source.mrk: You can create a free account even if you are an existing organization.

target.mrk: Můžete si vytvořit účet zdarma, i když jste již existující organizací.

trans-unit.source: This article addresses issues that you may have during signup.

seg-source.mrk: This article addresses issues that you may have during signup.

target.mrk: Tento článek se zabývá problémy, které se mohou vyskytnout během registrace.

trans-unit.source: What email address can I use with Business Central?

seg-source.mrk: What email address can I use with Business Central?

target.mrk: Jakou e-mailovou adresu mohu použít v Business Central?

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] requires that you use a work, or school, email address to sign up.

seg-source.mrk: requires that you use a work, or school, email address to sign up.

target.mrk: vyžaduje, abyste k registraci použili e-mailovou adresu práce nebo školy.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] does not support email addresses provided by consumer email services or telecommunication providers.

seg-source.mrk: does not support email addresses provided by consumer email services or telecommunication providers.

target.mrk: nepodporuje e-mailové adresy poskytované spotřebitelskými e-mailovými službami nebo poskytovateli telekomunikačních služeb.

trans-unit.source: This includes outlook.com, hotmail.com, gmail.com, and others.

seg-source.mrk: This includes outlook.com, hotmail.com, gmail.com, and others.

target.mrk: To zahrnuje outlook.com, hotmail.com, gmail.com a další.

trans-unit.source: If you try to sign up with a personal email address, you will get a message indicating to use a work or school email address.

seg-source.mrk: If you try to sign up with a personal email address, you will get a message indicating to use a work or school email address.

target.mrk: Pokud se pokusíte zaregistrovat pomocí své osobní e-mailové adresy, zobrazí se zpráva, že bude třeba použít pracovní nebo školní e-mailovou adresu.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting

seg-source.mrk: Troubleshooting

target.mrk: Odstraňování problémů

trans-unit.source: In many cases, registering for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] can be achieved by following the sign-up process.

seg-source.mrk: In many cases, registering for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] can be achieved by following the sign-up process.

target.mrk: V mnoha případech lze registraci do [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] provést řízením se dle následujícího procesu registrace.

trans-unit.source: However, there are several reasons why you may not be able to complete self-service signup.

seg-source.mrk: However, there are several reasons why you may not be able to complete self-service signup.

target.mrk: Existuje však několik důvodů, proč nemusí být možné samostatnou registraci dokončit.

trans-unit.source: The table below summarizes some of the most common reasons you may not be able to complete signup and ways you can workaround these issues.

seg-source.mrk: The table below summarizes some of the most common reasons you may not be able to complete signup and ways you can workaround these issues.

target.mrk: Níže uvedená tabulka shrnuje některé nejčastější důvody, proč není možné registraci dokončit, a způsoby, jakými tyto problémy vyřešit.

trans-unit.source: Symptom/Error Message

seg-source.mrk: Symptom/Error Message

target.mrk: Příznak / Chybová zpráva

trans-unit.source: Cause and Workaround

seg-source.mrk: Cause and Workaround

target.mrk: Příčina a Řešení

trans-unit.source: For Office 365 email addresses that are not registered in the United States, you receive a message like the following during signup:

seg-source.mrk: For Office 365 email addresses that are not registered in the United States, you receive a message like the following during signup:

target.mrk: U e-mailových adres Office 365, které nejsou registrovány ve Spojených státech, se během registrace zobrazí následující zpráva:

trans-unit.source: **That didn't work, we don't support your country or region yet.**

seg-source.mrk: That didn't work, we don't support your country or region yet.

target.mrk: To nefungovalo, zatím nepodporujeme vaši zemi nebo region.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] currently only supports Office 365 US registered email accounts.

seg-source.mrk: currently only supports Office 365 US registered email accounts.

target.mrk: v současné době podporuje pouze e-mailové účty 365 Office registrované v USA.

trans-unit.source: Personal email addresses such as nancy@gmail.com are not supported.

seg-source.mrk: Personal email addresses such as nancy@gmail.com are not supported.

target.mrk: Osobní e-mailové adresy, jako například nancy@gmail.com, nejsou podporovány.

trans-unit.source: You receive a message like the following during signup:

seg-source.mrk: You receive a message like the following during signup:

target.mrk: Během registrace se zobrazí následující zpráva:

trans-unit.source: **You entered a personal email address: Please enter your work email address so we can securely store your company's data.**

seg-source.mrk: You entered a personal email address:
Please enter your work email address so we can securely store your company's data.

target.mrk: Zadali jste osobní e-mailovou adresu:
Zadejte prosím svou pracovní e-mailovou adresu, abychom mohli bezpečně ukládat data vaší společnosti.

trans-unit.source: or

seg-source.mrk: or

target.mrk: nebo

trans-unit.source: **That looks like a personal email address. Enter your work address so we can connect you with others in your company. And don’t worry. We won’t share your address with anyone.**

seg-source.mrk: That looks like a personal email address.
Enter your work address so we can connect you with others in your company.
And don’t worry.
We won’t share your address with anyone.

target.mrk: To vypadá jako osobní e-mailová adresa.
Zadejte svou pracovní adresu, abychom vás mohli spojit s ostatními ve vaší společnosti.
A nebojte se.
S nikým vaši adresu sdílet nebudeme.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] does not support email addresses provided by consumer email services or telecommunications providers.

seg-source.mrk: does not support email addresses provided by consumer email services or telecommunications providers.

target.mrk: nepodporuje e-mailové adresy poskytované spotřebitelskými e-mailovými službami nebo poskytovateli telekomunikačních služeb.

trans-unit.source: To complete signup, try again using an email address assigned by your work or school.

seg-source.mrk: To complete signup, try again using an email address assigned by your work or school.

target.mrk: Pro dokončení registrace zkuste použít e-mailovou adresu přiřazenou vaší prací nebo školou.

trans-unit.source: If you still cannot sign up and are willing to complete a more advanced setup process, you can register for a new Office 365 trial subscription and use that email address to sign up.

seg-source.mrk: If you still cannot sign up and are willing to complete a more advanced setup process, you can register for a new Office 365 trial subscription and use that email address to sign up.

target.mrk: Pokud se stále nemůžete zaregistrovat a jste ochotni dokončit pokročilejší proces nastavení, můžete si zaregistrovat nové zkušební předplatné sady Office 365 a pomocí této e-mailové adresy se zaregistrovat.

trans-unit.source: .gov or .mil email addresses You receive a message like the following during signup:

seg-source.mrk: .gov or .mil email addresses You receive a message like the following during signup:

target.mrk: E-mailové adresy .gov nebo .mil Během registrace se zobrazí následující zpráva:

trans-unit.source: **[!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] unavailable: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is not available for users with .gov or .mil email addresses at this time. Use another work email address or check back later.**

seg-source.mrk: unavailable:
is not available for users with .gov or .mil email addresses at this time.
Use another work email address or check back later.

target.mrk: nedostupné:
není v současné době k dispozici uživatelům s e-mailovými adresami .gov nebo .mil.
Použijte jinou pracovní e-mailovou adresu nebo to zkuste později.

trans-unit.source: or

seg-source.mrk: or

target.mrk: nebo

trans-unit.source: **We can't finish signing you up. It looks like [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] isn't currently available for your work or school.**

seg-source.mrk: We can't finish signing you up.
It looks like [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] isn't currently available for your work or school.

target.mrk: Nemůžeme dokončit vaši registraci.
Vypadá to, že [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] pro vaši práci nebo školu momentálně není k dispozici.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] does not support .gov or .mil addresses at this time.

seg-source.mrk: does not support .gov or .mil addresses at this time.

target.mrk: v současné době nepodporuje adresy .gov nebo .mil.

trans-unit.source: Self-service signup is not enabled.

seg-source.mrk: Self-service signup is not enabled.

target.mrk: Samostatná registrace není povolena.

trans-unit.source: You receive a message like the following during signup:

seg-source.mrk: You receive a message like the following during signup:

target.mrk: Během registrace se zobrazí následující zpráva:

trans-unit.source: **We can't finish signing you up. Your IT department has turned off signup for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]. Contact them to complete signup.**

seg-source.mrk: We can't finish signing you up.
Your IT department has turned off signup for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].
Contact them to complete signup.

target.mrk: Nemůžeme dokončit vaši registraci.
Vaše IT oddělení vypnulo registraci do [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].
Chcete-li dokončit registraci, kontaktujte je.

trans-unit.source: or

seg-source.mrk: or

target.mrk: nebo

trans-unit.source: **That looks like a personal email address. Enter your work address so we can connect you with others in your company. And don’t worry. We won’t share your address with anyone.**

seg-source.mrk: That looks like a personal email address.
Enter your work address so we can connect you with others in your company.
And don’t worry.
We won’t share your address with anyone.

target.mrk: To vypadá jako osobní e-mailová adresa.
Zadejte svou pracovní adresu, abychom vás mohli spojit s ostatními ve vaší společnosti.
A nebojte se.
S nikým vaši adresu sdílet nebudeme.

trans-unit.source: Your organization’s IT administrator has disabled self-service signup for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: Your organization’s IT administrator has disabled self-service signup for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: IT správce vaší organizace zakázal samostatnou registraci pro [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To complete signup, contact your IT administrator and ask them to follow the instructions on the page below to allow existing users to sign up for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and to allow new users to join your existing tenant.

seg-source.mrk: To complete signup, contact your IT administrator and ask them to follow the instructions on the page below to allow existing users to sign up for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and to allow new users to join your existing tenant.

target.mrk: Pro dokončení registrace se obraťte na správce IT a požádejte jej, aby postupoval podle pokynů na níže uvedené stránce a umožnil stávajícím uživatelům registrovat se do [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] a umožnil novým uživatelům připojit se ke stávajícímu klientovi.

trans-unit.source: You may also experience this problem if you signed up for Office 365 through a partner.

seg-source.mrk: You may also experience this problem if you signed up for Office 365 through a partner.

target.mrk: Tento problém může také nastat, pokud jste se zaregistrovali do Office 365 prostřednictvím partnera.

trans-unit.source: Email address is not an Office 365 ID.

seg-source.mrk: Email address is not an Office 365 ID.

target.mrk: E-mailová adresa není ID Office 365.

trans-unit.source: You receive a message like the following during signup:

seg-source.mrk: You receive a message like the following during signup:

target.mrk: Během registrace se zobrazí následující zpráva:

trans-unit.source: **We can't find you at contoso.com. Do you use a different ID at work or school? Try signing in with that, and if it doesn't work, contact your IT department.**

seg-source.mrk: We can't find you at contoso.com.
Do you use a different ID at work or school?
Try signing in with that, and if it doesn't work, contact your IT department.

target.mrk: Nemůžeme vás najít na contoso.com.
Používáte v práci nebo ve škole jinou ID ?
Zkuste se přihlásit pomocí ní a pokud to nepomůže, obraťte se na IT oddělení.

trans-unit.source: Your organization uses IDs to sign in to Office 365 and other Microsoft services that are different than your email address.

seg-source.mrk: Your organization uses IDs to sign in to Office 365 and other Microsoft services that are different than your email address.

target.mrk: ID používané vaší organizací k přihlášení do Office 365 a dalších služeb společnosti Microsoft se liší od vaší e-mailové adresy.

trans-unit.source: For example, your email address might be Nancy.Smith@contoso.com but your ID is nancys@contoso.com.

seg-source.mrk: For example, your email address might be Nancy.Smith@contoso.com but your ID is nancys@contoso.com.

target.mrk: Například vaše e-mailová adresa může být Nancy.Smith@contoso.com, ale vaše ID je nancys@contoso.com.

trans-unit.source: To complete signup, use the ID that your organization has assigned to for signing in to Office 365 or other Microsoft services.

seg-source.mrk: To complete signup, use the ID that your organization has assigned to for signing in to Office 365 or other Microsoft services.

target.mrk: Chcete-li dokončit registraci, použijte ID, kterou vaše organizace přiřadila k přihlášení do Office 365 nebo jiných služeb společnosti Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: If you do not know what this is, contact your IT administrator.

seg-source.mrk: If you do not know what this is, contact your IT administrator.

target.mrk: Pokud neznáte svou ID, obraťte se na svého IT správce.

trans-unit.source: If you still cannot sign up and are able to complete a more advanced setup process, you can register for a new Office 365 trial subscription and use that email address to sign up.

seg-source.mrk: If you still cannot sign up and are able to complete a more advanced setup process, you can register for a new Office 365 trial subscription and use that email address to sign up.

target.mrk: Pokud se stále nemůžete zaregistrovat a jste ochotni dokončit pokročilejší proces nastavení, můžete si zaregistrovat nové zkušební předplatné sady Office 365 a pomocí této e-mailové adresy se zaregistrovat.
